name: givemetime
description: Project to give some time to a R&D project suggested by a team member

scripts.test: npm run --loglevel=silent test.lint && npm run --loglevel=silent test.unit
scripts.start: API_URL=http://localhost:3000 PGADMINPASSWORD=postgres PGPASSWORD=give_me_time GOOGLE_AUTH_MOCK=true docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up
scripts._db_migrate: PGPASSWORD=give_me_time docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm -w /usr/src/app api ./node_modules/.bin/db-migrate --migrations-dir ./migration

author: inovia-team
